name: You Are Not Home
description:
you are not home.

it’s familiar but it isn’t yours.

 there is something here.

something unnatural.

something filled with anger.

something…. following you. 

You Are Not Home was created for the 2022 Black and White Jam over a period of 12 days by Coalesce Studios. It is a prototype horror survival game where you are required to complete puzzles to get parts of a song to eventually aid your escape. Unfortunately the game isn't completable due to running out of time, but we have cut some elements out so players can still get a glimpse of the experience we intended it to be. All assets were created during the jam.

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
Esc - Pause
